comments:
Build: 200209111733

A java.lang.ArrayStoreException is thrown when I try to rename some classes.
That works fine on other classes. I think the problem is with classes which
contain inner classes, as I get the problem only on such classes.

On the second page of the 'Rename Type' refactoring wizard, I get an error :
"Internal Error while creating a change object. See log for Details."
and the following log :
